mapper.select: SELECT info.city_info_name as 'cityRankName', COUNT(route.city_route_departure_city) as 'cityRankCount' FROM plan as pl JOIN member_info as member ON pl.member_id = member.member_id JOIN city_route as route ON route.plan_no = pl.plan_no JOIN city_info as info ON info.city_info_no = route.city_route_departure_city WHERE member.member_info_gender = #{gender} GROUP BY route.city_route_departure_city ORDER BY COUNT(route.city_route_departure_city) DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT city.city_route_departure_city as 'cityRankName', COUNT(city.city_route_departure_city) as 'cityRankCount' FROM plan as pl JOIN member_info as member ON pl.member_id = member.member_id JOIN city_route as city ON city.plan_no = pl.plan_no WHERE member.member_info_birth > '1986-01-01' AND member.member_info_birth < '1997-12-31' GROUP BY city.city_route_departure_city ORDER BY COUNT(city.city_route_departure_city) DESC

SELECT if(SUBSTRING(route.city_route_departure_city, 9) < 74, info.city_info_do_name, info.city_info_name) as 'cityRankName', COUNT(route.city_route_departure_city) as 'cityRankCount' FROM plan as pl JOIN member_info as member ON pl.member_id = member.member_id JOIN city_route as route ON route.plan_no = pl.plan_no JOIN city_info as info ON info.city_info_no = route.city_route_departure_city GROUP BY cityRankName ORDER BY COUNT(route.city_route_departure_city) DESC

SELECT COUNT(pl.plan_name) as cityRankName FROM plan as pl JOIN member_info as member ON pl.member_id = member.member_id WHERE member.member_info_birth > '1986-01-01' AND member.member_info_birth < '1997-12-31'
AND DATE_FORMAT(pl.plan_departure, '%c') < 6 AND DATE_FORMAT(pl.plan_departure, '%c') > 2
AND DATE_FORMAT(pl.plan_departure, '%c') < 9 AND DATE_FORMAT(pl.plan_departure, '%c') > 5
AND DATE_FORMAT(pl.plan_departure, '%c') < 12 AND DATE_FORMAT(pl.plan_departure, '%c') > 8
AND DATE_FORMAT(pl.plan_departure, '%c') < 3 AND DATE_FORMAT(pl.plan_departure, '%c') > 11
